    • Field Detail

      • ecalConditions

        private EcalConditions ecalConditions
        Stores the calibrations and conditions for the calorimeter subdetector.

      • useFit

        private boolean useFit
        Whether to use pulse fitting (EcalPulseFitter) to extract pulse energy time. Only applicable to Mode-1 data.

      • pulseFitter

        private EcalPulseFitter pulseFitter
        The pulse fitter class.

      • useRunningPedestal

        private boolean useRunningPedestal
        Defines whether or not to use a running pedestal. A running pedestal calculates the pedestal based on the values of previous events.

      • runningPedestalMap

        private Map<EcalChannel,Double> runningPedestalMap
        Stores the running pedestal.

      • setFixShapeParameter

        public void setFixShapeParameter(boolean fix)
        Sets whether or not the pulse shape is a free parameter in the pulse fit.
        Parameters:
        fix - - true means that the width is not a free parameter and false that it is.

      • setGlobalFixedPulseWidth

        public void setGlobalFixedPulseWidth(double width)
        Sets the pulse width as a fixed parameter of the specified value. This also calls setFixShapeParameter(boolean) to true.
        Parameters:
        width - - The fixed-value width.

      • setUseFit

        public void setUseFit(boolean useFit)
        Defines whether or not to perform pulse-fitting.
        Parameters:
        useFit - - true indicates that pulse-fitting should be used and false that it should not.

      • setUseRunningPedestal

        public void setUseRunningPedestal(boolean useRunningPedestal)
        Defines whether or not to use a running pedestal.
        Parameters:
        useRunningPedestal - - true employs the running pedestal and false does not.

      • convertWaveformToPulse

        protected double[] convertWaveformToPulse(RawTrackerHit hit,
                                          int thresholdCrossing)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMode1RawConverter
        Performs pulse integration of the ADC buffer stored in the argument hit and outputs the results. These results include:
        • The pulse time
        • The integrated ADC sum
        • The Mode-7 "minimum ADC" value
        • The Mode-7 "maximum ADC" value
        • The fit quality
        Note that this driver does not implement pulse-fitting. This final value in the returned data is included for the benefit of implementing drivers.
        Overrides:
        convertWaveformToPulse in class AbstractMode1RawConverter
        Parameters:
        hit - - The hit.
        thresholdCrossing - - The threshold-crossing sample where upon the integration window is centered.
        Returns:
        Returns the integration data as a double array of the form { TIME, ADC_SUM, MODE7_MIN_ADC, MODE7_MAX_ADC, FIT_QUALITY }.

      • getGain

        protected double getGain(long cellID)
        Description copied from class: AbstractBaseRawConverter
        Gets the gain for the specified subdetector channel.
        Specified by:
        getGain in class AbstractBaseRawConverter
